title: Elon Musk’s $44 billion Twitter takeover is one of the biggest tech acquisitions of all time. Here’s where the billionaire’s deal ranks in tech history - Fortune
content: Elon Musk’s $44 billion Twitter takeover is one of the biggest tech acquisitions of all time. Here’s where the billionaire’s deal ranks in tech history  Fortune
description: The Tesla CEO made history on Monday with his Twitter takeover.
